name: LONG LIVE THE AXE
description:
A side-scrolling action adventure game,
set after the downfall of humanity,
in a world at war with itself.

When lost, chop wood.

Direct All Questions @owch_hurts on Twitter

$5 Price of admission gets you access to all updates
100% Stream/LP Friendly

Current Download: LONG LIVE THE AXE
Complete Version 1.03 - 2/24/2018

KNOWN BUGS/ISSUES
- None (Thanks for your reports!)


This game is content complete, but will still receive
bugfix and quality of life patches!
Please report any bugs or issues you have,
and I'll be happy to fix them as soon as possible.
Thanks so much for playing!

- Jesse

LONG LIVE THE AXE
